buginformation.summary: cannot exclude global this checks through command line
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem run command line utility supply flags warning level verbose jscomp off global this jscomp off non standard docs what the expected output what you see instead expect that global this and non standard docs warnings will ignored only non standard docs warnings are ignored what version the product are you using what operating system version 1180 sun please provide any additional information below jscomp error also doesn work with global this works with non standard docs thanks for the report this issue was closed revision 1291
